sermons.title: God's Truth About Marriage And Divorce
sermons.description: In this study of Satan's lies and God's truths, we look at what God has to say concerning marriage and divorce. The world has bombarded us with messages that tell us that sex outside of marriage is fine, that marriage isn't always lasting, and that divorce is an option. God, however, has laid down principles in His Word that we must agree upon. God has a plan for marriage and He did not design divorce as an option.

sermons.title: Mark - Is it Lawful for a Man to Divorce his Wife?
